name: Blossom
description:
As will all of our linens, this duvet is a handpainted original on which we only use high quality fabric paint.

Look for our coordinating throw pillows and sheets.

Cozy Up!


Care:

Machine Wash
Tumble low
Warm Iron


Set includes:


Twin: 68" W x 86" L duvet cover and one 20" W x 26" standard sham - $175

Full/Queen: 88" W x 90" L duvet cover and two 20" W x 26" standard shams - $210

King: 104" W x 90" L duvet cover and two 20" W x 36" L king shams - $245

100% cotton
250 thread count
Wrinkle Resistant
